title: Register
emailHelperText: Ditt e-postmeddelande som vi kan använda för att identifiera dig. Ditt e-postmeddelande är endast synligt för dig. Vi kommer inte att skräpposta dig.
usernameHelperText: Your username will show to other users.
termsHelpText: By registering you agree to our
updateUserText: Almost done! By setting your school and subject we will be able to automatically show you content based on them. You can also add these later.
registerCompleteText: Done! Also, please check your email for a link that you can use to verify your account.
